#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define m 2000
#define mod 1000000007


using namespace std;

int main()
{
	 int t,p,y,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>p>>y;
        y=y-2000;
        unsigned long long int r=p;
        for(i=0;i<y;i++)
          r=(r*r)%mod;
        cout<<r<<endl;
          

    }
  
    return 0;

}
